name: Stromkirk Bloodthief
originalText: At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target Vampire you control.

rulings.text: Stromkirk Bloodthief's ability cares whether an opponent lost life this turn, not how their life total changed. For example, an opponent who gained 2 life and lost 1 life in the same turn still lost life.

text: At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target Vampire you control.
